data.description:
Cloudlands 2 builds off of the fun of playing and building minigolf courses and adds the ability to play full sized golf courses.  Arm yourself with a putter, wedge, and driver and hit the links in the clouds.

- 54-hole single player campaign takes you through the Green Glades, Magic Meadows, and Reaper Ruins.  Play 18 hole mixes of full sized golf and minigolf.

- Level Editor with over 1000 pieces to build and make epic mini golf or full golf holes.  Create and upload your creations to allow other people to play.

- Expect to find a nearly unlimited supply of amazing user created levels.  All existing Cloudlands 1 holes are available to play (2000+).

- Online Multiplayer allows up to 4 players to play together.  Create a room, have your friends join, and off you go.

- Local Multiplayer pass and play allows you and your friends to play together by passing one headset between you.

- In-game voice chat and Oculus Avatars fully supported.

changelog.change_log: -Fixed a bug where Quest 2 could not view custom holes or hole leaderboards

- Added "What's New" and "FAQs" sections to main menu
- Added new "Dark" pieces to level editor
- Added 2 new skyboxes available in the level editor
- Added stroke count to club
- Bug Fixes
Fixed Bug where custom levels couldn't be loaded in the Level Editor.

Updated wind visuals.
Graphical issue fixes. 
Bug fixes.

-Added 3 new bosses to the campaign.
-Cross play multiplayer between Steam and Oculus PC.
-Various bug fixes.

[Fix]
Magic Meadow Hole 14 can be completed.
Slightly improved shadows.
Various bug fixes.

[Update]
Able to see your friends playing online in the friends list.

Updates - New options for warping behavior. - Default warp option changed to always warp ball to center of play space (hold down Oculus menu button to recenter play space). - Hole beacon graphics updated. - Other minor bug fixes.

Updates (Reverted back to previous update until level editor is fixed)
- Lobby shows the current online version the current game is using.
- Added a toggle to club shadows in the pause menu.

Fixes
- Controller vibration fixed when pointing at UI menus
- When setting handiness to left club and restarting the game, club no longer shows as right handed club.
- No longer disconnects host from online when they are in a room for a while and a second player joins.
- Can continue campaign if playing with no internet.
- Lines on the green disappear/reappear when toggling it in the pause menu.

Updates 
- New options for warping behavior. 
- Default warp option changed to always warp ball to center of play space (hold down Oculus menu button to recenter play space).
- Hole beacon graphics updated. 
- Other minor bug fixes.
